page.title: 06Dowty Mining 2
page.content: When you go into the factory you have to wear special protective glasses to stop sparks going in your eyes.1300 people work there. Dowty's income from selling pitprops is about Â£70,000,000 a year .In the factory where they were making pressure valves for the pitprops,there were robots doing jobs.There were machines that drilled holes in metal.Next we went into the machine shop where they built the actual legs and pitprops.In the paint room there were two big vacuums to get out the paint fumes. Afterwards we went to the room where they pack the pitprops and load them up onto lorries.Then we went to the store room and there were four lifts to get to the racks you wanted to.We had a ride on them.It was really good.
